alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 6:15PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sonoma and south central Napa Counties through 645 PM PDT... At 615 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boyes Hot Springs, or 8 miles east of Rohnert Park, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa, Napa, Petaluma, Sonoma, Boyes Hot Springs, South Santa Rosa Cdp, Yountville, Eldridge, El Verano, Glen Ellen, Temelec, Fetters Hot Spring and Fetters Hot Springs-Agua Caliente. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys
